body.name: Minimalist 3% PHA Alcohol Free Hydrating Face Toner for Pore Tightening | Mild Exfoliation, pH Balancing & Rebalancing Skin Microbiome | for Women & Men | 5 Fl Oz / 150 ml

features: [ AlCOHOL FREE MILD EXFOLIATING TONER ]: PHAs are next generation AHAs. Because of its larger molecule size compared to Glycolic acid (molecular weight 178 vs. 76 for Glycolic acid), it penetrates the skin slowly, hence offering gentle exfoliation without causing any skin irritation
[ PORE MINIMIZING ]: This toner is very lightweight and glides on the skin effortlessly before absorbing quickly & completely. Reduces pore size by removing congestion and balancing oil.
[ SKIN RENEWAL & RESURFACING WITH PRE & PROBIOTICS ]: Formulated with Prebiotics and Probiotics to balance skin microbiome, pH and enhance natural defence barriers of the skin

[ CLEAN & TRANSPARENT BEAUTY ]: This toner is (i) Fragrance-free (ii) Silicones-free (iii) Sulfates-free (iv) Parabens-free (v) Essential Oils-free and (vi) Dyes-free. Also, it is non-comedogenic and alcohol free. Formulated at pH 3.8 - 4.8 with high quality ingredients including Gluconolactone sourced from Jungbunzlauer, Switzerland and Prorenew Complex CLR from CLR Chemisches, Germany

[ FOR ALL SKIN TYPES ]: Alcohol free mildly exfoliating toner with biotics (pre and pro) for skin balancing and hydrators (Hyaluronic Acid, Polyglutamic Acid & more) for intense hydration. Suitable for all skin type viz. oily, dry, combination, sensitive, normal

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I been using this for a day and I have oily sensitive skin and I can already see a difference my pore are shrinking and my skin glowing so run don’t walk to buy this

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 41 year old w/ dehydrated combo skin LOVES this
reviews.reviewText: As a 41 year old with dehydrated and combination skin I have been struggling to find balance. I’m at a magical place where nothing is what is was and my skin has joined in the games! I heard about PHA and started this product 3 weeks ago and am thrilled with my skin, it somehow clarifies without stripping and i know Technically pores don’t “shrink” but my pores sure look like they have shrunk! This product somehow moisturizes yet also gently exfoliates which leaves my skin looking and feeling healthy and the blackheads are gone!!! (I tried taking a picture but my iPhone makes my skin look airbrushed and I’m not trying to create fake images!)Using 2x/day and the bottle is about 1/3 the way gone so i assume about a 2 month supply but I’ve Already purchased additional bottle to ensure I’ve got backup should any shortage or shipping delay arise ;)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I understand the company makes smallProducts but I wish they actually have a section where they can make bigger products . It just ran out so fast and it was a very good toner

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Changed my skin
reviews.reviewText: When I first bought this I had been using the Paula’s Choice toner and it was working great but it was pricey. I came across this skin care line and was instantly intrigued by the price and the meaning behind the products. I was skeptical about it working as good because it was significantly cheaper. But I was not let down. My face is still glowing even after making the switch to this product. I’ve always had very oily skin during the warm months and this has calmed it down completely. My face feels hydrated but not oily. When I received the items I was blown away by the packaging. So professional and well put together. I will continue to buy from this brand as long as the price point stays the same.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For your face.
reviews.reviewText: Ive bought it at least twice and will continue to buy it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought the PHA toner after starting chemo. My skin is extremely sensitive. I love the minimalist line because it is simply what it says it is. No fragrance, no oils, no bull. The toner dries down smooth and feels nice under serums, moisturizer and sunscreen.I wanted to use it for a month before reviewing and the results are impressive. My skin is more even and looks healthy which is rare while on chemo. I'm looking forward to trying many more of their products in the very near future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Have tried couple other toners and always reach for this as my favorite. It is cleansing and moisturizing as advertised. I like using this very much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great toner and you can’t beat the price
reviews.reviewText: I’ve noticed improvements in my skin and complexion since using this product daily. It actually works at helping to reduce pore size. It does not irritate my skin, and in fact, helps lock in moisture. I don’t know of any other toner with polyhydroxy acid that actually works for under $8. Minimalist is a wonderful brand available at low prices. I’ve always been happy with their products.

I have been trying out a lot of fancy Korean hydrating toners, and I have not yet been able to figure out what the deal is with their hype and why I have to pay 1000+ for them, when this one seems to do the same thing for less than 400/-

reviews.reviewerName: Shilpa Susan mathew Shilpa Susan mathew
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. minimalists is a perfect company It produces budget friendly Indian products it suits different kinds of skin and even for sensitive skin. It is the best choice in Amazon. We get the stuffs in a lower price. So it’s create a hydration of the skin, improve the skin texture, and also Eden tightening the pores It is a 150 ML product. It stays for a long time. It is also non comedogenic. And non-irritant formula. Best for skin go for it.
On to my 2nd bottle….I love how it isn’t drying on my face unlike other toners.Clears my pores well! I’ve less clogged pores and whiteheads after moving to Minimalist products
Delivered with an open box and Fingerprints all over the bottle. Really suspicious but the product looks ok.
